property.name: ipAddress
property.description: IP address of the Landslide Test Server

property.name: Hostname
property.description: Hostname of the Landslide Test Server

property.name: username
property.description: username to authenticate using basic authentication

property.name: password
property.description: password to authenticate using basic authentication

property.name: Room
property.description: Hostname or IP address of Landslide TAS that the TS is located in.
